name: add-to-queue
description: Add an item to the end of the user's current playback queue.

uri.description: The uri of the item to add to the queue. Must be a track or an episode uri.
uri.title: Spotify URI

device_id.description:
The id of the device this command is targeting. If
not supplied, the user's currently active device is the target.
device_id.title: Device ID
